Name: artic
Description: The creatures of Northrend masters of cold.

Name: beast
Description: The creatures of Azeroth are no strangers to war. A balanced race overall. Also pretty inexpensive in cost.

Name: demi-human
Description: A motley crew of species with similarities to the human race. Fighters boast versatile abilities.

Name: element
Description: Forces of magic far older than life itself. An offensive race.

Name: elf
Description: The first race to awaken on Azeroth. Fighters have mastered powerful offensive spells but lack in the area of support. A haughty selfish race.

Name: ghost
Description: Having transcended the physical world fighters have strong offensive magic and ranged attacks. Weak on defense.

Name: goblin
Description: Goblins are small humanoids. They constantly build and repair machines and work on new ideas. Very strong in mechanical thing and firearm.

Name: hybrid
Description: A strange race with no characteristics of its own. Instead morphs into fighters from other races.

Name: marine
Description: From the depths of the ocean rise creatures unlike any other.

Name: mech
Description: Boasts cutting edge military technology. Powerful core stats but expensive and have few special abilities.

Name: nature
Description: Defensive race. Slow but very resilient and have excellent abilities. All fighters have slight life regeneration.

Name: orc
Description: Strong in melee. Specializes in healing aura (regeneration) and debuff.

Name: paladin
Description: The noble warriors of humanity employ both a strong military and powerful healer in the defense of their shining kingdoms.

Name: prophet
Description: Powerful diviner he can build tower from all races.

Name: shadow
Description: Specializes in dark magic. High damage fighters with a good balance of offensive and defensive abilities.

Name: undead
Description: The horrifying Undead army consists of thousands of walking corpses and powerful necromantic magics.
